title: ITC expands its presence in Rajasthan with Storii Jaisalmer
description: ITC Hotels signs management agreement with Dangayach Group for Storii property in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. Storii by ITC Hotels, Jaisalmer, a 119-key resort on Jodhpur-Jaisalmer Road, offers plush interiors reflecting cultural significance.
